pkgmetadata.longdescription: R/Weka Interface // An R interface to Weka (Version 3.9.1). Weka is a collection of machine learning algorithms for data mining tasks written in Java, containing tools for data pre- processing, classification, regression, clustering, association rules, and visualization. Package 'RWeka' contains the interface code, the Weka jar is in a separate package 'RWekajars'. For more information on Weka see http://www.cs.waikato.ac.nz/ml/weka/.
